candidates.title: chore(rust/deps): Avoid patched dependencies
candidates.body: can't do a release with them

candidates.title: refactor!: hide serde dependency behind `ffi` feature
candidates.body:
**Description**:
The entire point of all the serde traits here is _specifically_ for the ffi feature, which we want to remove eventually:tm:.

Once CI is merged this will noticeably reduce the amount of time required for it to run, well, for the rust only CI jobs anyway, the Swift ones will get _some_ benefit because of other fat-trimming measures, but they won't be as pronounced.

**Checklist**

- [x] Documented (Code comments, README, etc.)
- [x] Tested (unit, integration, etc.)

candidates.title: chore: pay some dep-debt back
candidates.body:
**Description**:
This in PR I...
- bump deps in `Cargo.lock` (local-to-library)
- upgrade clap 3 -> clap 4 (dev dependency)
- replace dotenv with dotenvy. `dotenv` is [no longer maintained](https://rustsec.org/advisories/RUSTSEC-2021-0141.html), and `dotenvy` is the recommended replacement.
-  drive by refactor `EntityId::from_str`
- make uses of itertools more consistent


**Related issue(s)**:

Fixes #

**Notes for reviewer**:
<!-- Provide logs, performance numbers or screenshots of the new functionality -->

**Checklist**

- [ ] Documented (Code comments, README, etc.)
- [ ] Tested (unit, integration, etc.)

candidates.title: feat: add `{from,to}_bytes` to `{From,To}Protobuf`
candidates.body:
In this PR we:
* Add `FromProtobuf::from_bytes` 
* Add `ToProtobuf::to_bytes`
* Remove unused dependency `paste`

As a result of the above, almost all types still missing `{from,to}_bytes()` get those methods (still missing: `Transaction`)

**Checklist**

- [x] Documented (Code comments, README, etc.)
- [ ] Tested - tests need to be added to all items individually, which should be added to a greater Testing and Documenting Initiative (which I'll be doing personally anyway)

candidates.title: style: clean (almost) all the clippy lints

Still missing are some metadata ones, a panic relating to a `todo` and a false positive that's unsilenceable.

candidates.title: Updates
candidates.body:
- Move swift-tools-version to top of Package.swift file – https://github.com/hashgraph/hedera-sdk-swift/issues/23
- Rename `expiresAt` in `AccountUpdateTransaction` to `expirationTime` – https://github.com/hashgraph/hedera-sdk-swift/issues/18
- Rename `alias` to `aliasKey` in `AccountInfo` – https://github.com/hashgraph/hedera-sdk-swift/issues/17
- Rename `deleteAccountId` to `accountId` in `DeleteAccountTransaction` – https://github.com/hashgraph/hedera-sdk-swift/issues/14
- Add `Hbar` type (and use where appropriate)
- Add `LedgerId` and `StakingInfo`

candidates.title: feat: Key Derivation
candidates.body:
**Description**:
Adds Legacy Derive and Derive for Private Keys, although, technically, Mnemonics also had to be added as a side adventure.
* Add `legacy_derive` for `PrivateKey`
* Add `derive` for `PrivateKey`
* Add support for `Mnemonic`s

candidates.title: feat(rust): implement `TokenCreateTransaction`
candidates.body:
